rules.description: Home Row Mods - Left Hand (A=Cmd, S=Alt, D=Ctrl, F=Shift)
Home Row Mods - Right Hand (J=Shift, K=Ctrl, L=Alt, ;=Cmd)
Caps Lock to Escape (tap) / Navigation Layer (hold)
Navigation Layer - HJKL to Arrow Keys (when Caps Lock held)
Left Control to Toggle Numpad Layer
Numpad Layer - Right Side Numbers and Media
Left Command to Window Management Layer (one-shot)
Right Command + any key to Symbols Layer
Symbols Layer - Symbols and Function Keys
